summary: Add support for headers in signals and queries, matching the feature added to the Temporal Server. This aligns TypeScript SDK with Go and Java SDK implementations.
userImpact: Users cannot attach metadata headers to signals and queries in TypeScript SDK, limiting communication capabilities compared to other SDK languages.
proposedFix: Implement header support in signal and query APIs, following the pattern established in Go SDK PR #631 and referenced in Java SDK issue #940.
resolutionDetails: Feature was implemented to support headers in signals and queries, bringing TypeScript SDK to feature parity with Go and Java SDKs.
keyQuote: Headers were added to signals and queries in https://github.com/temporalio/temporal/pull/2149.
